channel.title: Giving spec
channel.description:
how do i add spec to a wepon??
how do i increase the spec on a wepon/decrease spec on a wepon?
NVM, FOUND A TUT.

item.title: Giving spec
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“twistedAngelz, post:2, topic:260500”]Am i right? Or can you send me the tut link?
Search: if(specOn == true){//npcs For Spec on Npc’s.
Ex:
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount > 74){
specialAtkNPC(false, 75, 347, 1872);
npcDamage(0);
That is d Scimitar…
Then For Spec on ppls=
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && specialAmount > 74){
specialAtk(false, 75, 347, 1872);
getHit(0);
AttackingOn2.setClientConfig(95, 0);
AttackingOn2.setClientConfig(96, 0);
AttackingOn2.setClientConfig(97, 0);
AttackingOn2.ProtMage = false;
AttackingOn2.ProtRange = false;
AttackingOn2.ProtMelee = false;
AttackingOn2.sM(“You have been injured!”);
AttackingOn2.checkHead();
?? Just send me the tut link if you won’t help…[/quote]

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

item.title: Giving spec
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Look at another weapon with a spec. It’s not that hard to modify a few lines of code. You’ll never learn unless you try for yourself.

Read full topic
